message.content:
cs.SD, cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM

Reasoning: 
- cs.SD (Sound): The paper focuses on using speech signals for person verification, which falls under the sound category.
- cs.CL (Computation and Language): The paper uses natural language processing techniques to process speech signals.
- cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition): The paper also uses visual signals (facial representations) for person verification, which falls under computer vision.
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper proposes an attention-based end-to-end neural network for learning multi-sensory associations, which falls under machine learning.
- cs.MM (Multimedia): The paper deals with multi-modal signals (speech and visual) for person verification, which falls under multimedia.
